title: Flamingals Bootcut Straight Leg High Rise Casual Botton Fly Raw Hem Denim Jeans
description: Features:high rise,vintage,botton fly,roll hem,cropped,straight leg.Step into retro style with these vintage-inspired high rise jeans. The button fly adds a classic touch, while the roll hem and cropped length give them a modern twist. Crafted with a straight leg silhouette, these jeans offer a flattering and timeless look.

Material: Made from carefully chosen super stretch fabric to ensure our customers feel comfortable in all positions, whether sitting or squatting. The soft, lightweight, and breathable fabric reduces any sense of restriction

Occasion: This garment is remarkably versatile and can be worn on a variety of occasions. Whether you're attending a casual get-together, or getting involved in outdoor activities, this piece is the suit choice. Additionally, it's an excellent option for students, working professionals, and anyone who wants to look stylish and feel comfortable

Jeans are a versatile choice, especially to show your style.The jeans characterized by its relaxed, laid-back, and eclectic vibe, allows you to embrace your inner free spirit and create a personalized and effortlessly chic ensemble

Please refer to size measurement in the last item picture. As outfits fit experts, our sizing is based on a true-to-size fit. Since the fabric is super stretchy, we recommend you follow the exact size that fits you in the table
